oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Town Hall Shuffle - Joe Maphis performance - 1956-08-23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Town Hall Shuffle, written by Joe Maphis, published by Vidor Publications Inc., produced by Don Law, recorded on August 23, 1956 at Radio Recorders studio in Hollywood, CA, released by Columbia on March 25, 1957, and performed by Joe Maphis (guitar), Marian Hall (steel), Clarence Dooley (bass), Billy Hill (fiddle), Margie Ann Warren (fiddle), Marian Adams (drums), and Jimmy Pruett (piano).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe Maphis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Maphis, Joe, 1921-1986; Law, Donald F., 1902-1982; Columbia Records, Inc; Pruett, Jimmy
